pullRequest.body:
For a polynomial $a \in k[X]$ and $n$ with $n \ne 0$ in $k$, $(a^n)' = 0$ if and only if $a' = 0$.


---

ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by YaelDillies.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12612856789/job/35150032984)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12612856789/job/35150033025)

```suggestion
    derivative (a ^ n) = 0 â†” derivative a = 0 where
  mp apd := by
```

```suggestion
    rcases apd with nz | powz | goal
```

It didn't, `apd` is
```
apd : (â†‘n = 0 âˆ¨ a ^ (n - 1) = 0) âˆ¨ derivative a = 0
```

```suggestion
  mpr hd := by rw [derivative_pow, hd, MulZeroClass.mul_zero]
```

```suggestion
section CommSemiringNoZeroDivisors

variable [CommSemiring R] [NoZeroDivisors R]

theorem derivative_pow_eq_zero_iff {n : â„•} (chn : (n : R) â‰  0) {a : R[X]} :
    derivative (a ^ n) = 0 â†” derivative a = 0 := by
  nontriviality R
  rw [â† C_ne_zero, C_eq_natCast] at chn
  simp +contextual [derivative_pow, or_imp, chn]

end CommSemiringNoZeroDivisors
```

The `_iff` is clear from context
```suggestion
theorem derivative_pow_eq_zero {n : â„•} (chn : (n : R) â‰  0) {a : R[X]} :
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Polynomial): `(a^n)' = 0` iff `a' = 0` when `n` doesn't divide the characteristic
